FuncDef:
The time-range qos-profile enable command configures the time range during which a QoS profile takes effect.
The undo time-range qos-profile enable command cancels the configuration.
By default, this function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command can be used to configure the QoS profile to take effect during a time range for users in the AAA domain.
A QoS profile can be configured to take effect during multiple time ranges for users in an AAA domain.
Configuration Impact
The QoS profile specified by this command takes effect during the set time range.
The QoS profile that is not specified by this command takes effect during the time range excluding the set time.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
This command is invalid for VPN leased line users, Layer 2 leased line users, Layer 3 leased line users, or LNS users.
This command cannot be configured if a flow queue in four-flow-queue mode is configured in the specified profile.
The command cannot be configured while the qos-profile is in time-range mode.
